import React from "react"; import Product from "../products"; import { Row, Col, Button, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductDetails = ({ match }) => { const product = Product.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

$ {product.price}

{product.description}

 Status : {product.countInStock >= 0 ? "in Stock" : "out of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductDetails;
